20110122025200.000|20110122025201.000|CC1|      that may be serious.

20110122025201.000|20110122025203.000|CC1|       of the face, lips,       
20110122025203.000|20110122025203.000|CC1|  throat or tongue, stop taking 
20110122025203.000|20110122025206.000|CC1|VESIcare and get emergency help.
20110122025206.000|20110122025208.000|CC1|   Tell your doctor right away  
20110122025208.000|20110122025208.000|CC1|       if you have severe       
20110122025208.000|20110122025210.000|CC1|         abdominal pain         
20110122025210.000|20110122025210.000|CC1|      or become constipated     
20110122025210.000|20110122025212.000|CC1|     for three or more days.    
20110122025212.000|20110122025212.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20110122025212.000|20110122025214.000|CC1|         blurred vision,        
20110122025214.000|20110122025214.000|CC1|  so use caution while driving  
20110122025214.000|20110122025217.000|CC1|     or doing unsafe tasks.     
20110122025217.000|20110122025217.000|CC1|     Common side effects are    
20110122025217.000|20110122025219.000|CC1|    dry mouth, constipation,    
20110122025219.000|20110122025220.000|CC1|        and indigestion.        
20110122025220.000|20110122025220.000|CC1|            ( woman )           
20110122025220.000|20110122025223.000|CC1| You have better things to join 
20110122025223.000|20110122025223.000|CC1|       than always a line       
20110122025223.000|20110122025225.000|CC1|        for the bathroom.       
20110122025225.000|20110122025225.000|CC1|           So, pipe up
